import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './style.css'; import logo from '../../assets/logo.svg'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FiArrowLeft } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { Map, TileLayer, Marker } from 'react-leaflet'; import api from '../../services/api'; import axios from 'axios'; interface Item { id: number; title: string; image_url: string; } const CreatePoint = () => { const [items, setItems] = useState([]); //Chamada da API useEffect(() => { api.get('items').then(response => { setItems(response.data); }) }, []); // Chamada API IBGE (usando axios direto para nao interferir com a base_url da minha api) useEffect return (
